attributes.action: Have a suitable ice facility built to see a return of top class ice hockey to London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the people of London want to see a suitable ice facility built to house an ice hockey team.  London needs an ice hockey team and due to a lack of suitable facilities in London, the top tier of British ice hockey doesn't have a team playing out of the capital.

Ice hockey has a loyal and sizeable following in the UK and London needs to have a team. A decent facility that can house ice hockey and other sports is crucial.
